Name: Microsoft Exchange Security
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The Exchange Security Audit and Configuration Insight solution analyze Exchange On-Premises and/or Exchange Online configuration and logs from a security lens to provide insights and alerts.

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

a. [Ingestion by the Logs Ingestion API of Exchange Configuration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/logs/logs-ingestion-api-overview)

b. Agent base Event logs collection from Exchange Servers and Domain Controllers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/agents/data-collection-rule-azure-monitor-agent)

c. [Agent based IIS Logs collection from Exchange Servers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/agents/data-collection-iis)

d. [Agent based Custom Logs collection from Exchange Servers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/agents/data-collection-text-log)
Workbooks: Workbooks/Microsoft Exchange Least Privilege with RBAC - Online.json
Workbooks/Microsoft Exchange Least Privilege with RBAC.json
